generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- building: A large stone building with architectural features is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible in the background and along the roadside.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking across the road, carrying bags or wearing backpacks.
- truck: A large white box truck is visible in the background, behind the pedestrians.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible mounted on a pole at the top right of the image.
- traffic sign: A rectangular traffic sign with text is visible mounted on a pole at the top right of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic sign.
- car: The hood of a car with a Mercedes-Benz emblem is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating a car is present.
